O

omitDialectFromFileName - Variable in class de.jpdigital.maven.plugins.hibernate5ddl.GenerateDdlMojo
If set to true and if only one dialect is configured and either GenerateDdlMojo.outputFileNamePrefix or outputFileNameSuffix are set the dialect name will be omitted from the name of the DDL file.
outputDirectory - Variable in class de.jpdigital.maven.plugins.hibernate5ddl.GenerateDdlMojo
Location of the output file.
outputFileNamePrefix - Variable in class de.jpdigital.maven.plugins.hibernate5ddl.GenerateDdlMojo
If set each name of an output file will be prefixed with the value of this parameter.
outputFileNameSuffix - Variable in class de.jpdigital.maven.plugins.hibernate5ddl.GenerateDdlMojo
If set the value of this parameter will be appended to the name of each output file.
